afterFileEdit.command: cd apps/web && npm run format || bun run format || true
cd apps/web && npm run lint -- --fix || bun run lint -- --fix || true

beforeCommit.command: cd apps/web && npm run lint || bun run lint || true
cd apps/web && npm test -- --passWithNoTests || bun test -- --passWithNoTests || true

stop.description: Run frontend tests when agent finishes
stop.command: cd apps/web && npm test -- --passWithNoTests || bun test -- --passWithNoTests || true

stop.description: Check for TypeScript errors in frontend

stop.command: cd apps/web && npm run lint || bun run lint || true
cd apps/web && npm run build || bun run build || true
